system.effect:
Gain Furious Assault and Xenos Weapon Training (Ork) Talents
Furious Assault: On a successful hit of an All Out Attack, can use Reaction to make another attack with the same bonuses/penalties as the original attack.
Xenos Weapon Training (Ork): Can use Shootas, Sluggas, Big Choppas, and All Primitive Melee Weapons without Penalty.

description.value: Gain Furious Assault and Xenos Weapon Training (Ork) Talents Furious Assault: On a successful hit of an All Out Attack, can use Reaction to make another attack with the same bonuses/penalties as the original attack.
